Privacy policy

1. Purpose of Data Processing

We collect personal data to respond to contact requests, maintain customer relationships, and market our services.

2. Types of Personal Data Collected

The personal data we collect includes your name, email address, and potentially your phone number through our contact form.

3. Technical Protection of Personal Data

We implement appropriate technical measures to protect personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. These measures include encryption, firewalls, and secure server environments. We regularly review and update our security practices to ensure the ongoing protection of your personal information.
